verses.verse: But <WG1161> there arose<WG1096> false prophets<WG5578> also<WG2532> among<WG1722> the people<WG2992>, as<WG5613> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> also<WG2532> there shall be<WG2071> false teachers<WG5572>, who<WG3748> shall privily bring in<WG3919> destructive<WG684> heresies<WG139>, denying<WG720> even<WG2532> the Master<WG1203> that bought<WG59> them<WG846>, bringing upon<WG1863> themselves<WG1438> swift<WG5031> destruction<WG684>.
And <WG2532> many<WG4183> shall follow<WG1811> their<WG846> lascivious doings<WG684>; by reason of<WG1223> whom<WG3739> the way<WG3598> of the truth<WG225> shall be evil spoken of<WG987>.

And <WG2532> in<WG1722> covetousness<WG4124> shall they<WG1710> with feigned<WG4112> words<WG3056> make merchandise<WG1710> of you<WG5209>: whose<WG3739> sentence<WG2917> now<WG691> from of old<WG1597> lingereth<WG691> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> their<WG846> destruction<WG684> slumbereth<WG3573> not<WG3756>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> God<WG2316> spared<WG5339> not<WG3756> angels<WG32> when they sinned<WG264>, but<WG235> cast<WG5020> them down to hell<WG5020>, and committed<WG3860> them to pits<WG4577> of darkness<WG2217>, to be reserved<WG5083> unto<WG1519> judgment<WG2920>;

and <WG2532> spared<WG5339> not<WG3756> the<WG2889> ancient<WG744> world<WG2889>, but<WG235> preserved<WG5442> Noah<WG3575> with seven others<WG3590>, a preacher<WG2783> of righteousness<WG1343>, when he brought<WG1863> a flood<WG2627> upon the world<WG2889> of the ungodly<WG765>;

and <WG2532> turning<WG5077> the cities<WG4172> of Sodom<WG4670> and<WG2532> Gomorrah<WG1116> into ashes<WG5077> condemned<WG2632> them with an overthrow<WG2692>, having made<WG5087> them an example<WG5262> unto those that should<WG3195> live ungodly<WG764>;
and <WG2532> delivered<WG4506> righteous<WG1342> Lot<WG3091>, sore distressed<WG2669> by<WG5259> the lascivious<WG766> life<WG391> of the wicked<WG113>

(for <WG1063> that righteous man<WG1342> dwelling<WG1460> among<WG1722> them<WG846>, in seeing<WG990> and<WG2532> hearing<WG189>, vexed<WG928> his righteous<WG1342> soul<WG5590> from<WG1537> day<WG2250> to<WG1537> day<WG2250> with<WG2041> their lawless<WG459> deeds<WG2041>):

the Lord<WG2962> knoweth how<WG1492> to deliver<WG4506> the godly<WG2152> out of<WG1537> temptation<WG3986>, and<WG1161> to keep<WG5083> the unrighteous<WG94> under punishment<WG2849> unto<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of judgment<WG2920>;

but <WG1161> chiefly<WG3122> them that walk<WG4198> after<WG3694> the flesh<WG4561> in<WG1722> the lust<WG1939> of defilement<WG3394>, and<WG2532> despise<WG2706> dominion<WG2963>. Daring<WG5113>, self-willed<WG829>, they tremble<WG5141> not<WG3756> to rail<WG987> at dignities<WG1391>:

whereas <WG3699> angels<WG32>, though<WG5607> greater<WG3173> in might<WG1411> and<WG2532> power<WG2479>, bring<WG5342> not<WG3756> a railing<WG989> judgment<WG2920> against<WG2596> them<WG846> before<WG3844> the Lord<WG2962>.

But <WG1161> these<WG3778>, as<WG5613> creatures without reason<WG249>, born<WG1080> mere<WG5446> animals<WG2226> to<WG1519> be taken<WG259> and<WG2532> destroyed<WG5356>, railing<WG987> in<WG1722> matters whereof<WG3739> they are ignorant<WG50>, shall in<WG1722> their<WG846> destroying<WG5356> surely be destroyed<WG2704>,

suffering <WG2865> wrong as the hire<WG3408> of wrong-doing<WG93>; men that count<WG2233> it pleasure<WG2237> to revel<WG5172> in<WG1722> the day-time<WG2250>, spots<WG4696> and<WG2532> blemishes<WG3470>, revelling<WG1792> in<WG1722> their<WG846> deceivings<WG539> while they feast<WG4910> with you<WG5213>;

having <WG2192> eyes<WG3788> full<WG3324> of adultery<WG3428>, and<WG2532> that cannot cease<WG180> from sin<WG266>; enticing<WG1185> unstedfast<WG793> souls<WG2192>; having a heart<WG2588> exercised<WG1128> in covetousness<WG4124>; children<WG5043> of cursing<WG2671>;

forsaking <WG2641> the right<WG2117> way<WG3598>, they went astray<WG4105>, having followed<WG1811> the way<WG3598> of Balaam<WG903> the son of Beor<WG1007>, who<WG3739> loved<WG25> the hire<WG3408> of wrong-doing<WG93>;

but <WG1161> he was<WG2192> rebuked<WG1649> for<WG3892> his<WG2398> own transgression<WG3892>: a dumb<WG880> ass<WG5268> spake<WG5350> with<WG1722> man<WG444>'s voice<WG5456> and stayed<WG2967> the madness<WG3913> of the prophet<WG4396>.

These <WG3778> are<WG1526> springs<WG4077> without water<WG504>, and mists<WG3507> driven<WG1643> by<WG5259> a storm<WG2978>; for whom<WG3739> the blackness<WG2217> of darkness<WG4655> hath been reserved<WG5083>.

For <WG1063>, uttering<WG5350> great swelling<WG5246> words of vanity<WG3153>, they entice<WG1185> in<WG1722> the lusts<WG1939> of the flesh<WG4561>, by lasciviousness<WG766>, those who are just<WG3689> escaping<WG668> from them that live<WG390> in<WG1722> error<WG4106>;

promising <WG1861> them<WG846> liberty<WG1657>, while they themselves<WG846> are<WG5225> bondservants<WG1401> of corruption<WG5356>; for<WG1063> of whom<WG3739> a man<WG5100> is overcome<WG2274>, of the same<WG5129> is he also brought into bondage<WG1402>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487>, after they have escaped<WG668> the defilements<WG3393> of the world<WG2889> through<WG1722> the knowledge<WG1922> of the Lord<WG2962> and<WG2532> Saviour<WG4990> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG1161>, they are<WG1707> again<WG3825> entangled<WG1707> therein<WG5125> and overcome<WG2274>, the last state<WG2078> is<WG1096> become worse<WG5501> with them<WG846> than the first<WG4413>.

For <WG1063> it were better<WG2909> for<WG1063> them<WG846> not<WG3361> to have known<WG1921> the way<WG3598> of righteousness<WG1343>, than<WG2228>, after knowing<WG1921> it<WG1994>, to turn back from<WG1537> the<WG1785> holy<WG40> commandment<WG1785> delivered<WG3860> unto them<WG846>.

<WG1161> It has happened<WG4819> unto them<WG846> according to the<WG3942> true<WG227> proverb<WG3942>, The dog<WG2965> turning<WG1994> to<WG1909> his own<WG2398> vomit<WG1829> again<WG1994>, and<WG2532> the sow<WG5300> that had washed<WG3068> to<WG1519> wallowing<WG2946> in the mire<WG1004>.
